title: Arduino-based Automatic Hand Sanitizer and Temperature Check Project for Health
description: automatic hand sanitizer and temperature check project for health using MLX90614 sensor for temperature check and using infrared sensor for distance sensor and using arduino microcontroller.

title: Smart clothes making project for elderly people based on arduino
partner: Mamun Faizun I, Ridho Faiqal, Alwi Hanafi
description: Smart clothing project for elderly people based on Arduino using gyro sensors to detect whether someone has fallen and using a pulse sensor that is displayed on the LCD.

title: Field Work Practice at Pura Barutama Offset Unit
description: Carry out electrical repair tasks on printing machines, cutting machines, folding machines, etc..
